sentences.english: There a large number of things for us to see a new goodd study in this well site.
sentences.chinese: 在这个井场有这么多我们要看和研习的东西。

sentences.english: Dianetics class will tell you where these notions come from.
sentences.chinese: 戴尼提研习班会告诉你，这些念头来自哪里。

sentences.english: You need to invite a minimum of 50 teachers.
sentences.chinese: 最低参加研习人数须达50老师。

sentences.english: Learn from tradition calligraphy but not limited by it, this is the principles of Wang Delin's calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 师古不泥古，这是王德林研习书法的宗旨。

sentences.english: My students have been working with the Star Festival.
sentences.chinese: 我的学生们一直在研习日本七夕节。

sentences.english: When he was but twelve years old he was already studying Tendai philosophical speculation.
sentences.chinese: 他十二岁时已经开始研习天台宗经书。

sentences.english: We study the Bible, we study Jewish thought.
sentences.chinese: 我们研习圣经，学习犹太人的思想。

sentences.english: The Institute Organizing Committee reserves the right to assign hotels based on a first-come-first-served basis.
sentences.chinese: 研习会筹备委员会保有权利，对先到先服务之原则。

sentences.english: I am planning changes that will help me learning the material covered in (course name).
sentences.chinese: 我已在作出改变，以令我更佳地研习此课程的素材。

sentences.english: If we did not do exercises- we wouldn't can get good study records.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们不举办运动，我们的研习成效就不会很好。

sentences.english: The mystics and hermits of T'ien Ch'i have always benn obsessed with longevity.
sentences.chinese: 天启王朝的隐士和修道者们热衷于研习长寿的秘密。

sentences.english: The system enrolls the student in the seminar.
sentences.chinese: 系统允许该学生参加研习班。

sentences.english: Study the traditional Chinese painting, the university in painting, a French after learning.
sentences.chinese: 自幼研习国画，大学修读油画，后旅学法国。

sentences.english: The system determines that the student is not eligible to enroll in the seminar he has chosen.
sentences.chinese: 系统确定学生没有资格参加他所挑选的研习班。

sentences.english: What degree do you plan to pursue?
sentences.chinese: 如不拟攻读学位则研习目的为何？

sentences.english: You may know every single piece of the learning tips.
sentences.chinese: 你可能明了扫数的研习诀要，儿童英语。

definition: to do research work/to engage in advanced studies
to study attentively (a book)/to delve into
junior scholar or pupil in imperial China
to learn a skill or art
to read and re-read sth until one is familiar with it
Confucian study of ethics/study of Daoism/school for Daoism in Tang and Song times/Daoist magic/another name for 理學|理学, rational learning of Song dynasty neo-Confucianism
